text: The Men's Freestyle 48 kilograms at the 1992 Summer Olympics as part of the wrestling program were held at the Institut Nacional d'Educació Física de Catalunya from August 4 to August 6. The wrestlers are divided into 2 groups. The winner of each group decided by a double-elimination system. == Results == ;Legend *WO — Won by walkover === Elimination A === ==== Round 1 ==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; " !
